channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17285] Fixes for bit vector retrievals and merging
item.summary: Fixes for bit vector retrievals and merging

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
ashutoshc: the new String(new byte[]) needs Base64 to work, which takes up extra memory for no reason.

To fix the metastore properly, we need to go fix

https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/standalone-metastore/src/main/thrift/hive_metastore.thrift#L387

and make it optional bytes bitVectors instead of optional String.

Heh, jcamachorodriguez beat me to the punch - HIVE-17286 already changed it.

-5: optional string bitVectors
+5: optional binary bitVectors

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12881117/HIVE-17285.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

Are these two patches compatible - looks like they're not.

static byte[] extractSqlBlob(Object value) throws MetaException {
second will be rebased.. once this in.. since if(value instanceof byte[]) is also needed.
